channel.title: 3 quick easy answers (JUST STARTED 508)
channel.description:
When replying please state your sentence with #1 OR #2 OR #3
#1 How do we add shops in pali (GENERAL STORE)
#2 How do we change the starting position
#3 How do we enable option TALK for a certain npc to ask you stuff (AKA GIVE YOU A MENU)

item.title: 3 quick easy answers (JUST STARTED 508)
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

#1 - Go to your server folder and choose shophandler. Change what you want to sell (####, ##) 4 #'s being the code and 2#'s being the amount. You can find the codes on the website.

Iâ€™m not sure about the others. Sorry!
